column1: #text=I decided I wanted to take a nice , luxurious bath .
#text=First , I went through my bathroom cabinets and found some really nice smelling bath salts .
#text=I found my biggest , fluffiest towel and set it next to the bathtub .
#text=I turned on the water and let it run until it was hot .
#text=Once the water ran hot , I shut the drain , so the water would fill up the top .
#text=Then I poured my nice smelling bath salts into the tub .
#text=They turned the water a lovely pink color .
#text=I watched the water fill up the tub and the bathroom became steamy .
#text=I grabbed a washcloth from the cabinet and got in the water .
#text=I let myself relax and enjoy the experience .
#text=It was very quiet and I almost fell asleep .
#text=When I was done , I emptied the water out of the drain , toweled myself off , and left the bathroom feeling very refreshed .
